task.title: Configuring CIoT for inbound roamers
task.shortdesc: Use global parameter sendLtemRatTypeToScef to enable the support for LTE-M RAT type to the SCEF.

step.cmd: Configure the DRMP value for the CIR towards the IWK-SCEF.
Enable the support for LTE-M RAT type to the SCEF.
Disable UE monitoring in IMSI range services.
Configure the support for the IWK- SCEF.

note.p: The PLMN name should be null.
Up to 64 scefToGrp for home PLMN + 64 scefToGrp for roaming PLMN(0) are allowed.
Up to 32 active groups for home PLMN + 32 active groups for roaming PLMNs are allowed.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm scefToGrp create --mappingId 21 --plmnName scefMappingType all scefGrpListName scefGrp_21 shutdown true cmm scefToGrp modify --mappingId 21 --cirDestHostFqdnName --cirDestRealmFqdnName --iwkScef <list-item>

step.cmd: Configure the timer for S1 UE capability information for LTE-M wait time.
